nodes.text: This base was located on an unknown mountain planet. The Galactic Civil War order was used by the Galactic Empire. It was likely that the base contained Imperial ship and medical items. Once Sabine Wren, Hera Syndulla and Chopper came here to steal the medical bag of a Lambda class shuttle. Sabine and Hera steal the shuttle, but realize that he has stolen the wrong shuttle. Meanwhile, stormtroppers were chasing them. Chopper then picked up the right shuttle and took Sabine and Hera to his own shuttle, the right shuttle, and drove them away from there.
